meanings.definition: Having more than one husband at the same time.
meanings.sent1: In the polyandrous family, she had two loving husbands.
meanings.sent2: The polyandrous woman was married to multiple men simultaneously.
meanings.sent3: It must be quite a challenge to plan a polyandrous wedding with multiple grooms!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a polyandrous garden, blooming with affection for each of her husbands.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a polyandrous relationship can be quite intriguing to some.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a polyandrous society.
meanings.sent1: The polyandrous culture allowed for multiple husbands for one woman.
meanings.sent2: In the polyandrous community, marriages with more than one husband were common.
meanings.sent3: Living in a polyandrous society would definitely require good communication skills.
meanings.sent4: The interconnectedness of their beliefs made the village a polyandrous tapestry of traditions.
meanings.sent5: The polyandrous customs of the tribe were passed down through generations.
